casebody.data:
No. 77987 Supreme Court of Nevada. FILED SEPTEMBER 04, 2019

CRISWELL RADOVAN, LLC, a Nevada Limited Liability Company; CR Cal Neva, LLC, a Nevada Limited Liability Company; Robert Radovan; William Criswell; and Powell Coleman and Arnold LLP, Appellants,
v.
George Stuart YOUNT, Individually and in His Capacity as Owner of George Stuart Yount Ira, Respondent.

DISMISSED.
